Class DefaultAnalyticsGenerator

java.lang.Object

org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, AnalyticsGenerator
public class DefaultAnalyticsGenerator
extends Object
implements AnalyticsGenerator, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

A default implementation of AnalyticsGenerator that creates Atlas analytics in the database.

Author:
Misha Kapushesky

generateAnalytics

public void generateAnalytics()
Description copied from interface: AnalyticsGenerator
Run the NetCDFGenerator as a standalone, complete mechanism to generate all possible NetCDFs. If you wish to only regenerate a small slice of data, use AnalyticsGenerator.generateAnalyticsForExperiment(String).

Note that this method is not guaranteed to be synchronous, it only guarantees that the generation of NetCDFs has started. Implementations are free to define their own multithreaded strategies for NetCDF generation. If you wish to be notified on completion, you should register a listener to get callback events when the build completes by using AnalyticsGenerator.generateAnalytics(uk.ac.ebi.gxa.analytics.generator.listener.AnalyticsGeneratorListener). You can also use a listener to get at any errors that may have occurred during NetCDF generation.

Calling this method is equivalent to calling generateNetCDFs(null).

Specified by:
generateAnalytics in interface AnalyticsGenerator

generateAnalytics

public void generateAnalytics(AnalyticsGeneratorListener listener)
Description copied from interface: AnalyticsGenerator
Run the NetCDFGenerator as a standalone, complete mechanism to generate all possible NetCDFs. If you wish to only regenerate a small slice of data, use AnalyticsGenerator.generateAnalyticsForExperiment(String)

Specified by:
generateAnalytics in interface AnalyticsGenerator
Parameters:
listener - a listener that can be used to supply callbacks when generation of the NetCDF repository completes, or when any errors occur.

generateAnalyticsForExperiment

public void generateAnalyticsForExperiment(String experimentAccession)
Description copied from interface: AnalyticsGenerator
Run the NetCDFGenerator to regenerate NetCDFs for only one particular accession.

Note that this method is not guaranteed to be synchronous, it only guarantees that the generation of NetCDFs has started. Implementations are free to define their own multithreaded strategies for NetCDF generation. If you wish to be notified on completion, you should register a listener to get callback events when the build completes by using AnalyticsGenerator.generateAnalyticsForExperiment(String, uk.ac.ebi.gxa.analytics.generator.listener.AnalyticsGeneratorListener). You can also use a listener to get at any errors that may have occurred during NetCDF generation.

Calling this method is equivalent to calling generateNetCDFsForExperiment(experimentAccession, null).

Specified by:
generateAnalyticsForExperiment in interface AnalyticsGenerator
Parameters:
experimentAccession - the accession of the experiment to generate

generateAnalyticsForExperiment

public void generateAnalyticsForExperiment(String experimentAccession,
                                           AnalyticsGeneratorListener listener)
Description copied from interface: AnalyticsGenerator
Run the NetCDFGenerator to regenerate NetCDFs for only one particular accession.

Specified by:
generateAnalyticsForExperiment in interface AnalyticsGenerator
Parameters:
experimentAccession - the accession of the experiment to generate
listener - a listener that can be used to supply callbacks when generation of the NetCDF for this experiment completes, or when any errors occur.
